root.synopsis:
COMMANDER'S INTENT: OPERATION DEMETER.
1. PURPOSE: Prevent the proliferation of advanced anti-aircraft munitions to the local Cartel to maintain regional stability.
2. METHOD: Gundog Squad will conduct a deniable infiltration of Docking Bay 4. - Phase I: Intel/SIGINT acquisition via Harbormaster Office and Server Hub. - Phase II: Sabotage of munitions on freighter 'Mariposa.' - Phase III: Clean exfiltration via North Perimeter.
3. END STATE: Munitions destroyed; Gundog assets extracted; Zero Agency attribution (Maintain Viability > 0%).
TACTICAL CONSTRAINT: "The world is watching." Minimize "TikTok Burn." High-visibility violence is a failure condition.

location.name: Docking Bay 4
location.desc: The primary arrival point. Industrial, exposed, currently docking the freighter 'Mariposa'.

location.name: Harbormaster Office
location.desc: A two-story administrative hub. Holds physical manifests and the local Port Authority head.

location.name: Server Hub
location.desc: The digital nervous system of the port. Encrypted but accessible for Mike.

location.name: North Perimeter
location.desc: The only viable exfiltration route before the main road is cut off by the Cartel.

unit.name: SAM
unit.traits: Cynical, logical, fluent in six languages. Hates "Mission Creep."
unit.fuse: Medium. If idle turns > 5, she begins questioning the Handler's ethics/competence.

unit.name: DAVE
unit.traits: Surly, brief, PTSD-hardened. Requires clear Rules of Engagement.
unit.fuse: Short. If idle turns > 3, he begins taking 'proactive' security measures (Going Loud).

unit.name: MIKE
unit.traits: Hyper-focused, tech-obsessed, relies on heavy caffeine. Easily distracted by 'clean' signals.
unit.fuse: Long. If idle turns > 8, he starts doing things for fun which are either off-mission, or worse, counter-productive.

asset.caption: SAT-INTEL: CARTEL QRF INBOUND. ETA 10 MINUTES.
CCTV FEED ESTABLISHED: MONITORING HARBORMASTER OFFICE.
